title: Learn about the interpretation of seeing a boy in a dream according to Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Seeing a boy in a dream means interpreters that the dream is good and its interpretations vary depending on the boy’s appearance and the dreamer’s feeling during the dream. Seeing a boy in a dream by Ibn SirinSeeing a boy in a dreamSeeing a boy in a dream means goodness, but if the dreamer sees an unknown child sitting in a strange place, this indicates feelings of anxiety. And the appearance of many annoying things in the dreamer’s life. The interpretation of seeing a boy in a dream symbolizes sadness, anxiety, troubles and problems, but if the boy in the dream is tall despite his young age, this means that the dreamer will receive a large inheritance. If the dreamer sees an elegant child smiling at him, The vision indicates that he will soon occupy a high position in society that will make him gain people’s love and respect. The dream also indicates that there will be an engagement, marriage, or entering into a romantic relationship in the near future. If the dreamer sees a boy with long, thin hair, then the dream indicates that he has been betrayed. By a relative and friend. Seeing a boy in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that the infant in the vision indicates that the dreamer is in great trouble from which he cannot escape, so he must be careful in his next steps and ask the Lord (the Almighty) to protect him from all harm. It portends Dreaming generally brings bad luck and leads to problems and obstacles in the dreamer’s way. It may also indicate that he will soon discover the hypocrisy of a loved one and this will be the reason for breaking off the relationship between them. If the dreamer is suffering from poor living and financial weakness and sees a young child running and playing in his dream, then the dream symbolizes the improvement of material conditions, the elimination of worries and problems, And paying off debts. A specialized Egyptian website that includes a team of senior dream and vision translators in the Arab world. To access it, type the Egyptian Dream Interpretation Site on Google. Seeing a boy in a dream from Nablus If a prisoner sees himself carrying a small child and walking with him in a dream, this indicates kindness and portends his imminent release, and God Almighty is Most High and Most Knowing. If the dreamer sees himself eating a boy in a dream, this It means that he is getting money from illegal sources, so he must check the sources of his money and try to stay away from forbidden money and get his money from the ways that the Lord said. God Almighty is pleased. Seeing a boy in a dream for a single woman. Seeing a boy in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates that she is suffering from emotional problems with her fiancé or current partner, as there are many disagreements between them during this period due to misunderstanding and the unwillingness of either of them to compromise in order to please the other. Interpretation Seeing a boy in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates that she is going through a major psychological crisis at the present time due to her separation from her closest friends, and it was said that the vision indicates that she was betrayed by her lover. The dream indicates financial problems or the emergence of a major problem in the working life of an unmarried woman due to numerous differences with her colleagues, and the vision is an indication of disagreements between the dreamer and one of her family members. The dream urges her to try to control her anger and struggle

title: Interpretation of seeing cooked eggplant in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin, Imam Al-Sadiq and Al-Nabulsi.

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing cooked eggplant in a dream According to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin, Imam Al-Sadiq and Al-Nabulsi, eggplant is considered one of the most beneficial vegetables and carries many nutrients, vitamins and fibers necessary for the body. The coming period, God willing, and he must stop worrying about his livelihood and money, so in this article we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing cooked eggplant in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq and. - Nabulsi.Interpretation of the dream of seeing cooked eggplant in a dream. Interpretation of Imam Al-SadiqSeeing eggplant in a dream is a sign of an abundance of goodness and an abundance of food. If the eggplant is fried, this indicates the high status and great value that the fortuneteller enjoys in his environment. Eggplant in a man’s dream is A sign of the abundance of goodness and the wide life that he is on his way to. As for seeing cooked eggplant in a woman’s dream, it indicates the emotional state she is going through, and God is Most High. Whoever sees eggplant in his dream while it is still being roasted or toasted, this indicates many problems that The dreamer will face it in his life and some quarrels that he will face. Buying eggplant means that a lot of money and an abundance of goodness will come to the dreamer in the near future, God willing. Interpretation of the dream of seeing fried eggplant in a dream. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that the dream of eggplant is evidence of many obstacles and problems that he suffers from. Among them in the dreamer’s life, especially if the eggplant was black in color, and Ibn Sirin considered it an unpleasant vision, and God Almighty and all-knowing. If the eggplant in the dream was fried, this is an indication that the dreamer carries in his heart a lot of hatred, hatred, and envy towards the people around him. Dreaming about white eggplant is a sign of happiness and joy that will come to a person in the near future by God’s command. As for the dreamer who sees in his dream that he is eating a large amount of eggplant, this means that he will achieve many achievements and ambitions that he has always desired and strived to achieve. Interpretation of a dream about seeing Cooked eggplant in a dream, interpretation of Al-Nabulsi. Imam Al-Nabulsi agrees with Imam Al-Sadiq that eggplant is one of the praiseworthy dreams that has connotations that bring a lot of goodness, even if that eggplant is black. The most important different interpretations of seeing eggplant are: Al-Nabulsi believes that when a person dreams that he is carrying eggplant in his dream, this is a sign of abundant food, abundant food, good morals, and a good reputation that distinguishes the dreamer, and God is Most High. Those who know. As for the dreamer who sees eggplant in its season, this is a sign of good news on its way to the dreamer. While seeing eggplant out of season has a different meaning, it means that some problems and obstacles will happen to him, and some worries and sorrows, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. If the eggplant is boiled This indicates many sorrows, problems, and fears that are on their way to the dreamer. Whoever sees stuffed eggplant in his dream, this is a sign of good news coming on his way if he...

If the eggplant is boiled This indicates many sorrows, problems, and fears that are on their way to the dreamer. title: Interpretation of a dream about a farm and green plants in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a farm in a dream narrated by an unmarried woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman. A farm. A dream of green planting, trees, plants, and fruits by Ibn Sirin and others. Interpretation of a farm and planting in a dream by Ibn Sirin. We begin by citing the interpretation of the great scholar Ibn Sirin, where he said that seeing a person as if he were on a farm or in the middle of green planting indicates a diligent search for The world produces a lot of good, and this vision indicates good deeds and may indicate that the dreamer will gain money or that his wife will give birth to a son. Whoever sees in his dream that he is buying a green farm, even if he is single, will marry a good woman (that is, he has been married before). And he sees selling a green farm in a dream, and this indicates greed, selling the afterlife, and the pursuit of desires, or divorcing his wife in the hope of another woman who is of lower status, beauty, and purity than his wife, and this happens in the case of selling a cheap farm. Interpretation of a farm in a dream. Nabulsi. As for Nabulsi, he mentioned that vision. Farm and green planting. In a dream, it indicates a year full of goodness, and it can refer to the dreamer gaining a new source of income, and seeing the world or his legitimate farm and the green planting indicates his mind and acquired knowledge, and seeing a farm in a dream means marrying a married woman, and a farm. In the dream of an unmarried girl, a happy event will happen to her, A pregnant woman’s dream indicates a blessed birth, God willing. Interpretation of a farm and green plants in a woman’s dream. An unmarried girl’s vision of a farm and green plants in a dream shows the happiness that is found in feeling romantic emotions and feelings due to finding a suitable partner, and it can indicate nourishment and kindness and it can indicate heaven, and it is said. The unmarried woman who sees the farm in her dream shows that girl fulfilling all her desires and wishes for this year. Interpretation of a farm in a married dream As for the married woman seeing the farm in her dream, with a quiet, happy home and a close-knit family, it also indicates a good husband. Farm indicates a year in which a cherished wish will be fulfilled , which may be the birth of a child or obtaining a new home. Interpretation of a farm in a pregnant woman’s dream. As for a pregnant woman who sees a farm in a dream, it represents an easy birth, or a blessing for the newborn, or livelihood and money, and it can also indicate the fulfillment of a desire and desire that is dear to the pregnant woman. Interpretation of walking among plants, trees, and fruits in a dream: Whoever sees that he is walking among plants and trees and eating their fruits, for example, such as eating figs, oranges, pomegranates, or apples, for example, this indicates that he will obtain money that will benefit him or travel. And green planting is also a sign of virgins, and it is abundant food for married people, and good news in a sick man’s dream as it portends good. Interpretation of watering green plants in a dream: As for whoever sees in his dream that he is watering green plants in an orchard, farm, or garden, this indicates that he will know Boys and girls the Qur’an, and whoever sees that he is watering trees with water, this is good news. Well done for his marriage to a girl of goodness, beauty and morals, just as she was promised that she would give birth to offspring

title: The 20 most important interpretations of the king’s dream of seeing Ibn Sirim’s married wife

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing the king for a married woman. Seeing the king in a dream is one of the dreams that can bring anxiety and fear to the soul because of the prestige, influence and power that he enjoys in reality, so we will explain in detail in the following lines of the article the various indicators that relate to the king’s dream about seeing a married woman and whether This would bring her good or evil. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a king for a married woman. There is much evidence received from jurists regarding the interpretation of seeing a king in a dream for a married woman, the most prominent of which are the following: If a woman dreams of a king, this indicates her special status in the hearts of the people around her, and she A distinguished personality who possesses unique qualities that are not available to many people. If a married woman is a mother in reality and sees the king in a dream, this indicates the bright future that awaits her children and her assuming prestigious positions in the state. If the married woman is happy to see the king in a dream, this is a sign On the happy and stable life that she lives with her children and their father. When a married woman dreams of seeing the king from afar, this proves that she will achieve her goals and desires, but after facing many difficulties and obstacles. Interpretation of a dream about a married woman seeing the king, according to Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Muhammad bin Sirin - may God have mercy on him - mentioned in Interpretation of a married woman’s dream of a king is as follows: If a married woman sees the king in her dream and feels happy and comfortable and tries to approach him, this is an indication of the extent of love, tenderness, respect and appreciation between her and her husband and her constant desire to please him. Also, a married woman’s vision of the king in her dream suggests that her partner A good man, with good morals, piety and responsibility. If a married woman sees herself crying in a dream and feels upset because she is watching the king, this is a sign of her husband’s corruption and she will face many problems and disagreements with him. If the king gets angry in a married woman’s dream, this is evidence of the evil that will befall her in the period If a pregnant woman sees in a dream that she is talking to the king, this is a sign that God - Glory be to Him - will grant her righteous offspring, and that the birth will go peacefully and will not harm much. Within her. If the pregnant woman quarrels with the king in the dream, this means that she will give birth to a healthy girl. As for the case of the pregnant woman who sees the president in a dream, this is a great and abundant provision on the way to her, God willing, and an indication of the approaching date of birth. And if the pregnant woman is with her husband in the dream While seeing the king, this proves the close relationship between them and the extent of understanding, respect and appreciation. What is the interpretation of seeing Queen Rania for a married woman? If a married woman sees Queen Rania in a dream, this is evidence of her desire to obtain a distinguished position in society and possess influence and power. If the woman suffers From pressures and restrictions in her life, and she saw Queen Rania while she was sleeping, this leads her to her desire for liberation and the ability to control her life as she wants without interference.

title: Interpretation of beating in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of beating in a dream: Beating is generally considered unacceptable behavior and he does not like to be exposed to it because it hurts him psychologically and physically, but in the world of dreams it is a little different because it often indicates good and bad. The details that we learn together below... So follow us. Interpretation of being beaten in a dream. Seeing being beaten in a dream has different interpretations depending on what the dreamer sees in the dream. In the event that the dreamer is hit in the stomach, it means that the dreamer will achieve many good things in life. When the dreamer sees If someone hits him violently in a dream, this means that he has fallen into a big problem and cannot get out of it. In the event that the dreamer sees in a dream that he is hitting the animal he is riding, this symbolizes the passage of a difficult period during which material crises will make him sad. Seeing some people hitting The dreamer in this is an indication that the dreamer will fall into many crises because of his family and some relatives. When the dreamer collides with someone he knows, this indicates that there are benefits that will return to him soon by God’s command. Using sharp tools to strike during the dream is a sign that bad things will happen in the dreamer’s life. In the event that the dreamer sees that someone is beating him with a stick, it is interpreted that this person is trying to advise him forever and does not want to reveal his secrets. For a stranger to flog the dreamer in a dream means that the dreamer will soon face a financial crisis. When one sees in his dream that someone He hits him with iron handcuffs, as this is a sign that he speaks obscene words and gossip, and this is bad behavior that must be stopped. The interpretation of beating in a dream shows the extent of cruelty and exhaustion that the dreamer is going through in his life. Interpretation of beating in a dream by Ibn SirinImam Ibn Sirin explained that seeing being beaten in a dream portends good And the benefits as long as there is no violence. When the dreamer sees in a dream that someone is hitting him with a sword, this means that things in the dreamer’s life are getting worse. Being exposed to danger and trouble is the interpretation of being stabbed with a knife in a dream. It has also been reported that being stabbed from behind in a dream symbolizes that the dreamer is betraying him from Before people very close to him. Seeing being beaten with a whip in a dream symbolizes that the dreamer is suffering from major crises in the dreamer’s life and that he commits sins and does not try to repent. Clapping the hand in a dream symbolizes that the dreamer around him is trying to help him in his life and is interested in helping him in crises. If someone hits him Known to the dreamer on his hand in a dream, this is good news for many benefits and huge livelihoods. When the dreamer sees someone punching him in the face, it means that the dreamer will reach a great position in his life and have a great relationship. When someone sees in a dream that his boss is at work He slaps him on the hand, which means that the dreamer will get a promotion soon. Interpretation of hitting in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi. Hitting Imam Al-Nabulsi in a dream symbolizes that the dreamer will have a series of events in his life in the coming period. If the debtor sees in a dream that someone is tapping him quietly, then this It means that he will get rid of his financial crises and his circumstances will improve. A brother hitting his brother in a dream indicates that

title: Gold earring in a dream for a pregnant woman

title: Interpretation of seeing a dead father in a dream while he is alive by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing a dead father in a dream while he is alive. Many of those who have suffered from the loss of a father and deprived him as a source of security and life support want to see him in a dream, because of their longing for him and their desire to be reassured about his condition, in addition to hearing his will or what he wants to convey to his family members, so seeing A dead father in a dream is one of the visions that carry many meanings and connotations, which the viewer continues to pursue until his heart is at peace, which you will mention through this article. So follow us. Seeing a dead father in a dream while he is alive. Seeing a dead father in a dream while he is alive. Its interpretation depends on what the dreamer sees in his dream, and God knows best. But if you see the dead father sad and anxious or crying in the dreamer’s dream, this may indicate his need. To pray and give alms in his name or that he feels the condition of the son and the problems and crises that he is going through through his life. It is also said that the dream is a reflection of the dreamer’s feelings and his desire to see his father and his need for advice and help in overcoming obstacles and difficulties. Seeing a dead father in a dream while he is alive for a son SirinThe scholar Ibn Sirin pointed out the good or evil of seeing a dead father in a dream while he is alive, according to visible events, because of his good deeds and willingness to draw closer to God Almighty and help those in need. He concluded his interpretations by explaining that the happiness of a dead father in a dream is an indication of the presence of blessing and success in life. The dreamer will be able to achieve all his goals and aspirations in the near future. However, if he sees his father taking some of his possessions, this indicates that he will be exposed to loss and fall into tragedies and sorrows. Seeing a dead father in a dream while he is alive is for the sake of single people. A single woman’s vision of her deceased father in a dream indicates that he is alive. She is alive that many positive changes will occur in her life. Good luck and we wish you success. A dead father crying in a dream does not mean good in all circumstances, as it may be a sign of his bad deeds and suffering in the afterlife, and therefore his daughter must pray for him and pay zakat in his name. But on the other hand, the dream may express the girl’s many sins and mistakes, which makes the father feel sad about her condition and fear for her about the hardships and judgments that may befall her in the future, and God knows best. Seeing a dead father in a dream while he is alive for a married woman. If a married woman sees that her dead father has come back to life and was visiting her in her home and was happy and happy, this indicates that she is blessed with an abundance of goodness and abundance and the end of all judgments or disputes. She is suffering with her husband. And if she hopes to achieve the dream of motherhood, then after this vision she can herald the fulfillment of desires and the nourishment of good offspring. If she sees her deceased father crying or looking sad, this indicates his fear for his daughter of betrayal days, as a result of the exacerbation of disputes with her husband. Or because she has a huge financial problem or crisis and the viewer needs her father to feel safe and help her overcome the crises she is going through now. Seeing a dead father in a dream while he is alive

title: Interpretation of an orange in a dream Orange in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of picking and buying a tree - sweet sour orange juice for an unmarried woman - for a pregnant woman - peeling oranges according to Imam Al-Azab Al-Sadiq, Ibn Sirin and others. Seeing oranges in a dream is considered one of the important dreams that we see constantly in our dreams and it has many important meanings, as the vision means a lot to us in our lives, so many people get upset. When we see a vision and feel confused and anxious, we search for the correct interpretation through scholars and websites for it. Our site saves you time in searching for an interpretation of dreams. We offer you an elite group of Arab scholars and translators. Interpretation of a dream about oranges in a dream: Seeing oranges in a dream indicates mental health. And the physical. Seeing a healthy orange tree full of fruit means health, goodness, and success. If he sees one, two, or three oranges, they are children. Sweet is livelihood and kindness, and sour is illness for the dreamer and his children. Seeing yourself eating oranges in a dream is annoying and can mean loss and problems at work. Seeing a bunch of lemon flowers indicates a close marriage for single people and happiness for married people. If you see yourself throwing an orange at someone, this means that he will ask you to marry him. Seeing a dream over a pile of oranges indicates the death of a relative. But seeing an orange tree full of fruit and orange blossoms It is a sign of marriage, good luck and wealth. Seeing an orange tree without flowers and fruit means that love relationships will falter, but do not lose hope. As for seeing an orange tree without leaves, it indicates the possibility of celibacy for some time. Seeing buying oranges indicates new social relationships. While seeing orange peel in a dream indicates that there is someone who wants to deceive you. Seeing orange juice in a dream means that your efforts are useless. Interpretation of an orange tree in a dream. Seeing orange trees in a dream, if they are healthy and heavy with ripe fruit, means good health and good success. And if you eat an orange in This dream is a bad omen and indicates the illness of a friend or relative, which makes you worry and worry and may mean loss and problems in the field of work. If the oranges in the dream are beautiful and smell fragrant, this means bad luck and a small loss in trade and work. But if you dream that you are sleeping on a pile of Oranges, this means the death of a relative. If you buy oranges in a dream at the request of your wife and your wife eats the oranges, this means that problems and troubles will go away and be replaced by goodness and benefit. We will review for you the interpretation of seeing oranges in a dream as interpreted by the famous historical interpreter Ibn Sirin in his interpretations and books. Interpretation of a dream Oranges in a dream for a single woman: If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is sleeping on a lot of oranges, then this is evidence of the death of one of her family members, and eating rotten oranges indicates exhaustion and problems in this girl’s life. Interpretation of oranges in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees in a dream that she She eats oranges and they are bitter, as this is evidence of her lack of nutrition and her children. Interpretation of oranges in a dream

title: Interpretation of seeing Eid in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: What is the importance of seeing Eid to Ibn Sirin? Sticks for Muslims, Eid al-Fitr is called by this name because it comes after the blessed month of Ramadan (the month of fasting), which is the short Eid, and the Great Eid, which is the blessed Eid al-Adha, and it is called so because God Almighty has redeemed us. Mr. Ismail, the son of our master Abraham, made a great sacrifice, and therefore Eid al-Adha was given this name according to the proportion of the sacrifice. Muhammad bin Sirin said in his book The Interpretation of Great Dreams that seeing holidays in a dream is an indication of the good and happy news that will come to the dreamer in the near future, and the vision portends the death of worries, problems and challenges. And overcoming crises and anxiety. Seeing holidays in a sinner or sinner’s dream may indicate accepting repentance, the dreamer’s good circumstances, and receiving forgiveness and forgiveness from God Almighty, his life in the coming period. Seeing Eid al-Adha in a dream. As for the interpretation of the vision? Eid al-Adha in a dream, is a sign For the departure of worry, sadness and severe pain, the release of the prisoner, the release of the prisoner from his prison, the comfort close to the prisoner, the companionship and friendship of justice and patience. People. As for seeing a person in his dream seeing holidays other than Eid al-Fitr or Eid al-Adha, it is evidence of suffering and distress, leaving work, or lack of money. What is the meaning of a dream about Eid by Ibn Shaheen? Ibn Shaheen mentioned that seeing Eid in a dream is a sign of joy, happiness, and enjoyment that comes to the dreamer. After a period of worry, anxiety, distress, and semi-relief after severe distress. As for seeing other unusual celebrations in the dream, it is an indication of the dreamer’s troubles and problems at work, or the loss of power or prestige, or the loss of money and influence, and therefore this vision serves as a message for him to review. As well as the affairs and affairs of his life in order to overcome the period of distress and stop the situation. Seeing Eid al-Adha in a dream is a sign of sustenance, money and blessing in the dreamer’s life and money, overcoming the injustice of the enemies and the nearness of victory, and God knows best. Eid in a dream is for Nabulsi. The day Abdul Ghani conveyed it was not different from Nabulsi. As for the interpretation of seeing Eid in a dream, According to previous commentators such as Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen, where Al-Nabulsi said: The Eid is a sign of the disappearance of distress and strife and the disappearance of sorrows and distress. And the arrival of joy and happiness, and God knows best. We finish today’s article, and you can leave your questions at the end of the article along with the social status of the viewer.
